headline: Plastic Dielectric Films Market Projected to be Valued at USD 1.94 Billion by 2032, Driven by Rising Demand for High-Performance Electronic Applications | Report by SNS Insider
summary: Increasing investments in renewable energy and smart devices drive global growth of plastic dielectric films across consumer and industrial applications.Austin, Sept. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Plastic Dielectric Films Market Size was valued at USD 1.32 billion in 2024 and is expected to reach USD 1.94 billion by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 4.93% over the forecast period of 2025-2032. headline: Top 13 Companies Shaping the Plate & Frame Heat Exchanger Market in 2025 and Beyond | Plate & Frame Heat Exchanger Company Evaluation Report 2025
summary: The Plate and Frame Heat Exchanger Companies Quadrant offers an in-depth analysis of the global market, evaluating 122 companies with the Top 13 recognized as quadrant leaders. This analysis highlights key market players, technological advancements, and industry trends, showcasing the efficiency and modular design of plate and frame heat exchangers. Leading companies include Ansell Limited, Honeywell International Inc., 3M, DuPont, and MSA Safety, focusing on innovation and sustainability.Dublin
